'''''Vinyar Tengwar 19''''' is the nineteenth issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal dedicated to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
{{VTnav|18|20}}

==Contents==
* Cover: "Gildor and Frodo converse near Woodhall" — Alan Lee
* ''In Memoriam'': [[Taum Santoski]] — Patrick H. Wynne
* E.L.F. News
* Letters to ''VT''

* "''Lirilla Valinorello Noldorinwa'': A Song of the Noldor of Valinor" — trans. Christopher Gilson
* "Words and Devices: Pointed Remarks and Cutting Comments (column) — Patrick H. Wynne and Carl F. Hostetter
* "A Fragment of ''[[Valaquenta]]''" — trans. Ryszard Derdzinski
* "Transitions in Translations: Toppo and Poppo (column) — Arden R. Smith
